actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to increase the penalty under that act for the illegal distribution of certain drugs by high echelon pushers.

summary.text: Increases the penalty under the Controlled Substances Act for the illegal distribution of drugs by high echelon pushers. Defines "high echelon pusher" as any person engaged in a conspiracy to import, smuggle, or purchase for further distribution a controlled substance in schedule I or II which is a narcotic drug.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to increase the penalty under that act for the illegal distribution of certain drugs by high echelon pushers.
